summary:
This mod removes the music score in all the \"sacred\" locations of Skyrim and, also, it modify the acoustic spaces of them (acoustic reverbs).
This is for immersion experience when you visit one of these locations.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Welcome to
[img]http://s10.postimg.org/hrk31j8tl/titolo.jpg[/img][/center]

* OVERVIEW *
This mod removes the music score in all the \"sacred\" locations of Skyrim and, also, it modify the acoustic spaces of them (acoustic reverbs).
This is for immersion experience when you visit one of these locations.

The modified locations are:

Temple of Dibella — Markarth
Temple of the Divines — Solitude
Temple of Kynareth — Whiterun
Temple of Mara — Riften
Temple of Talos — Windhelm

and all the Halls of the Dead in Falkreath, Markarth, Riften, Solitude, Whiterun and Windhelm.

* INSTALLATION *
Download, unrar into data folder, enable via Menu Launcher and play Skyrim!

* UNINSTALL *
Just delete the file. Removing the mod while you\'re in a modified location should be safe, however I recommend to be in exterior before uninstalling the mod.

* COMPATIBILITY *
This mod is compatible with everything except for other mod that does the same stuff. My suggestion is to place this mod at the bottom of loading order.

* ENJOY *
I\'m on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods
Join me!
author: MannyGT
